title: Stargazer
description: An evocative short about curiosity and wonder as two siblings spend a night mapping constellations and imagining future adventures. This challenge emphasizes visual composition, lighting, and the use of silence to build mood.

title: Echoes
description: A reflective piece about memory and how small sounds from the past shape who we become. Focus on sound design, repetition, and editing rhythm.

title: Paper Boat
description: A tender, low-budget story that follows a child's paper boat on a neighborhood stream as it encounters small adventures. Emphasize practical effects and point-of-view shots.

title: Tiny Hero
description: A micro-drama where an everyday act of kindness changes a community. This challenge highlights pacing, casting non-actors, and authentic performances.

title: Rainy Day
description: A cinematic study of mood and atmosphere set during a single rainy afternoon. Concentrate on reflections, color temperature, and the choreography of background action.

title: Garden Song
description: A lyrical vignette about growth and seasonal change told through close observation of a small garden. Use time-lapse, natural sound, and gentle narration.
